compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

Properties.Description: Monty API - Financial backtesting and analysis

/Users/ayangoel/Desktop/Projects/hacklyt.serviceRawFile:
service: monty-api

provider:
  name: aws
  ecr:
    images:
      appimage:
        path: ./
        platform: linux/amd64
  region: us-east-1
  stage: ${opt:stage, 'dev'}
  timeout: 900  # 15 minutes (maximum for Lambda)
  memorySize: 3008  # Maximum memory for better performance
  
  # Environment variables
  environment:
    STAGE: ${self:provider.stage}
    GOOGLE_API_KEY: ${env:GOOGLE_API_KEY}
  
  # IAM Role statements for Lambda permissions
  iam:
    role:
      statements:
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - logs:CreateLogGroup
            - logs:CreateLogStream
            - logs:PutLogEvents
          Resource: "arn:aws:logs:*:*:*"

functions:
  app:
    image:
      name: appimage
    name: ${self:service}-${self:provider.stage}
    description: "Monty API - Financial backtesting and analysis"
    architecture: x86_64
    
    # API Gateway configuration
    events:
      - http:
          path: /
          method: ANY
          cors: true
      - http:
          path: /{proxy+}
          method: ANY
          cors: true

# Package configuration
package:
  patterns:
    - '!.venv/**'
    - '!__pycache__/**'
    - '!*.pyc'
    - '!.pytest_cache/**'
    - '!tests/**'
    - '!cert.pem'
    - '!privkey.pem'
    - '!main.py'
    - '!node_modules/**'
    - '!.git/**'
    - '!.env'

# No plugins needed for container Lambda - dependencies built into Docker image

# Clean configuration without problematic sections
